newsitem.title: ROMANIA: Romania auctioned rate almost flat at 226.08 pct.
newsitem.headline: Romania auctioned rate almost flat at 226.08 pct.

text.p: The average rate on one-week funds at the Romanian central bank (BNR) refinancing auction on Thursday remained almost unchanged at 226.08 percent against last week's 226.31 percent, BNR data showed.

The BNR's one-week funds offer of 600 billion lei, down from 660 billion last week, was slightly undersubscribed, with five banks bidding a total 590.3 billion lei at rates ranging from 226 percent to 227 percent.
The Lombard rate, applied to overdraft credits and set by multiplying the average one-week auctioned rate by 1.6, is also expected to stay near last week's 362.1 percent.
